title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Classic Pancakes
summary: Fluffy, golden breakfast pancakes that are perfect for a weekend morning. Serve with maple syrup and fresh berries.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce, crunchy croutons, and shaved parmesan cheese tossed in a creamy Caesar dressing.

title: Beef Burger
summary: Juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, and special sauce, served with crispy fries.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Traditional Italian pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, and olive oil.

title: Chocolate Brownie
summary: Rich, fudgy chocolate brownie with a crispy top and gooey center. Served with vanilla ice cream.

title: Greek Salad
summary: Fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese with oregano and olive oil dressing.
